subject: Soccer
Drones (Pilotless Planes)
Flags, Emblems and Insignia
Demonstrations, Protests and Riots
UEFA European Football Championship
lead_paragraph: Ismail Morina, a drone operator, guided a nationalist Albanian flag into a stadium in Belgrade. Nearly a year later, Albania and Serbia are set to meet again.
snippet: Ismail Morina, a drone operator, guided a nationalist Albanian flag into a stadium in Belgrade. Nearly a year later, Albania and Serbia are set to meet again.
